title: Why the concrete in data centers is a hidden source of carbon emissions
description: Data centers siphon huge amounts of energy to power artificial intelligence.
content:
Data centers siphon huge amounts of energy to power artificial intelligence. But their environmental footprint starts to balloon even before the first server switches on due to the immense amount of carbon-intensive concrete needed to build them.

description: Nvidia Corp. provided technical support that helped DeepSeek improve its breakthrough artificial intelligence model despite US export controls designed to restrict the Chinese startup’s access to high-end American chips, according to the Republican head of the House China committee.

title: Couple Uses ChatGPT to Help Name Their Newborn Son
description: A Maryland couple used a generative artificial intelligence tool to help them settle on a name for their firstborn son.
content:
A Maryland couple used an AI tool to help them settle on a name for their firstborn son.

title: Apple Just Made Its Second-Biggest Acquisition Ever After Beats
description: Apple today confirmed to Reuters that it has acquired Q.ai, an Israeli startup that is working on artificial intelligence technology for audio. Apple paid close to $2 billion for Q.ai, according to sources cited by the Financial Times. That would make this Apple's second-biggest acquisition ever, after it paid $3 billion for the popular headphone and audio brand Beats in 2014.
content:
Apple today confirmed to Reuters that it has acquired Q.ai, an Israeli startup that is working on artificial intelligence technology for audio.
